'''''The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition''''' is a special edition album comprising of the soundtrack from ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'', by [[Howard Shore]]. It was released digitally and on CD on [[9 December]] [[2013]].

==Contents==
===Disc 1===
# [[The Quest for Erebor (soundtrack)|The Quest for Erebor]]
# [[Wilderland (soundtrack)|Wilderland]]
# [[A Necromancer]] (Bonus Track)
# [[The House of Beorn]] (Extended Version)
# [[Mirkwood (soundtrack)|Mirkwood]] (Extended Version)
# [[Flies and Spiders (soundtrack)|Flies and Spiders]] (Extended Version)
# [[The Woodland Realm]] (Extended Version)
# [[Feast Of Starlight]]
# [[Barrels Out Of Bond]]
# [[The Forest River]] (Extended Version)
# [[Bard, A Man Of Lake-Town]] (Extended Version)
# [[The High Fells]] (Extended Version)
# [[The Nature Of Evil]]
# [[Protector Of The Common Folk]]

==Disc 2==
# [[Thrice Welcome]]
# [[Girion, Lord Of Dale]] (Extended Version)
# [[Durin's Folk (soundtrack)|Durin's Folk]] (Extended Version)
# [[In The Shadow Of The Mountain]]
# [[A Spell Of Concealment]] (Extended Version)
# [[On The Doorstep]]
# [[The Courage Of Hobbits]]
# [[Inside Information (soundtrack)|Inside Information]]
# [[Kingsfoil (soundtrack)|Kingsfoil]]
# [[A Liar And A Thief]]
# [[The Hunters]] (Extended Version)
# [[Smaug (soundtrack)|Smaug]] (Extended Version)
# [[My Armour Is Iron‎]]
# [[I See Fire]] (By [[Ed Sheeran]])
# [[Beyond The Forest]]
